page.title: 16OCCUPATIONS
page.content: Artist:1{Army:2}Bank/Office:4 {Civil {servant:1}Cleaner:9{Council Worker:3 {Dockyard manual worker:29 {Dockyard(clerical):4}Dental assistant:1{Driver:10}Electrician:2 Entertainer:1{Factory:22}Fireman:2 Fisherman:3 {Garage:5}Gardener:2{Gasfitter:2 {Hotel/Catering:7 }Hairdresser:2 {Homeworker:2}Joiner:3{Librarian:1 Marines:5{Merchant Navy:3}Nurse:8{Old {peoples'homes:6}Pubs:9{Plumber:1 Police:5{Postman:1}Painter:3{Railway:1 Royal Navy:15{School canteens:10 Shops:26{Students:2}Teacher:1 {Telecom:3}TV studio:1{Unemployed:31 Welder:1 {TOTAL SAMPLE=250 THIS SURVEY OF CHILDRENS' FAMILIES WAS CARRIED OUT AT DRAKE PRIMARY SCHOOL, KEYHAM, PLYMOUTH DURING JULY 1985.
